Class CollidableRectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rectangle
      • CollidableRectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Car

    public class CollidableRectangle
extends Rectangle
    Extends the SpeedRaceSP.Rectangle. This rectangle is taken into account in the collision detection.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int effect
      Detemines the effect that a collision with this rectangle has: 0 (block), 1 (bounce), 2 (slow down), 3 (finishes the game), 4 (Speed control)

      • Fields inherited from class Rectangle

        height, id, width, x, y

    • Field Detail

      • effect

        public int effect
        Detemines the effect that a collision with this rectangle has: 0 (block), 1 (bounce), 2 (slow down), 3 (finishes the game), 4 (Speed control)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CollidableRectangle

        public CollidableRectangle(double x,
                           double y,
                           int width,
                           int height,
                           int id,
                           int effect)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        x - The position of the Rectangle on the x-axis
        y - The position of the Rectangle on the y-axis
        width - Rectangle width
        height - Rectangle height
        id - Rectangle id
        effect - The effect in case of collision
